name: resolveTaskList(for:with:)
desc: Resolves the task list from which to delete tasks.DeprecatedThis intent is no longer available. You may define a custom intent instead. For more information, see Deprecated SiriKit Intent Domains.
declaration:
optional func resolveTaskList(for intent: INDeleteTasksIntent, 
                         with completion: @escaping (INDeleteTasksTaskListResolutionResult) -> Void)
